c74object.name: bl.indexof
c74object.digest: Get the index of an element in a list
c74object.description: Returns the 0-based index of a given element in a list (if the element can be found).

inlet.digest: The list to find elements in.

outlet.digest: The 0-based index of the element in the list if the element is found.
Returns 1 if the element has been found, 0 otherwise.

method.name: long/float/symbol
method.description: In left inlet: the element to find in the list.

method.name: list
method.digest: The list to find elements in.
method.description: In right inlet: the list in which we want to find elements.
